brief_summary.textblock:
This is a study to evaluate the tolerance and antiviral effect of oral vitamin C in
      HIV-infected.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Safety and Effectiveness of Different Doses of Vitamin C in HIV-Infected Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Dose Escalation Study to Evaluate Tolerance and Antiviral Effect of Oral Vitamin C in Two Groups of HIV-Infected Adults

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.source: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID)

lead_sponsor.agency: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID)

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Primary Purpose: Treatment
